ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of LEO HOUSAKOS, of Laval, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of VIA Rail Canada Inc. to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Lore Marie Mirwaldt.
